title: Immigration: the waves that shaped Australia (Captioned)
creator_credit: Paul Woolston-Smith and Dept of Immigration and Ethnic Affairs
brief_description: This video outlines the migrations which have made us what we are - starting with the arrival of First Nations peoples. The landing on the 26th January, 1788, of the officers, marines and convicts of the First Fleet, started successive waves of mostly European migration whose cultures enriched our nation.
